content: Limit availability period for this link by setting an expiration date.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message asking users to set an expiration date when editing a link. It appears in a UI component that allows users to limit the availability period of a link, and is likely displayed on a form or input field where users can enter an expiration date.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit redundant. The phrase 'تاريخ لصلاحية هذا الرابط' (date for the validity of this link) repeats the concept of expiration. A more concise translation would improve clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتقييد فترة صلاحية هذا الرابط بتعيين تاريخ انتهاء الصلاحية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the use of 'بتعيين' can be slightly less elegant. Consider a more flowing phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: قم بتقييد فترة صلاحية هذا الرابط عن طريق تحديد تاريخ انتهاء الصلاحية.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'Սահմանափակեք այս հղման հասանելիության ժամկետը՝ ժամկետ սահմանելով:' is somewhat redundant. The phrase 'ժամկետ սահմանելով' (while grammatically correct) repeats the concept of setting a deadline, which is already implied by 'ժամկետը'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise translation like: 'Սահմանափակեք այս հղման հասանելիության ժամկետը ժամկետով:' or 'Սահմանափակեք այս հղման հասանելիության ժամկետը սահմանելով ժամկետ:'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '有効期限を設定して、このリンクの利用可能期間を制限します' is technically correct but a bit formal and verbose for a user interface element. A more natural and concise translation would improve usability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 有効期限を設定してリンクの利用期間を制限します。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Indicați data expirării pentru a limita perioada de disponibilitate a acestui link' is slightly awkward. A more natural Romanian phrasing would be preferable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Stabiliți o dată de expirare pentru a limita perioada de disponibilitate a acestui link.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Вы можете выбрать срок действия для этой ссылки' (You can choose an expiration date for this link) doesn't fully convey the meaning of 'Limit availability period for this link by setting an expiration date.'. It's more of a statement of possibility rather than a directive to limit availability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ограничьте срок действия этой ссылки, установив дату окончания.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'කල් ඉකුත්වන දිනයක් සැකසීමෙන් මෙම සබැඳිය වලංගු කාලය සීමා කරන්න' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness in Sinhala. ' වලංගු කාලය' (valangu kaalaya) translates to 'valid time' which isn't the most common phrasing for 'availability period'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කල් ඉකුත්වන දිනයක් සැකසීමෙන් මෙම සබැඳිය ක්‍රියාකාරී කාලය සීමා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'සබැඳිය' (sabandiya) is a somewhat formal word for 'link.' It might be more appropriate to consider a more common term depending on the target audience.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කල් ඉකුත්වන දිනයක් සැකසීමෙන් මෙම සබැඳිය ක්‍රියාකාරී කාලය සීමා කරන්න.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Nastavte dátum vypršania platnosti, aby ste obmedzili obdobie platnosti tohto odkazu' is somewhat literal and not the most natural-sounding Slovak. While technically correct, it's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise and fluent translation like 'Obmedzte platnosť tohto odkazu nastavením dátumu expirácie' or 'Nastavte dátum expirácie na obmedzenie platnosti tohto odkazu.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Ограничи период доступности за овај линк постављањем рока употребе' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Limit availability period for this link by setting an expiration date.'. 'Рок употребе' literally translates to 'expiry date' or 'date of use', which isn't the best fit for the intended meaning of setting an expiration date for a link's availability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ограничите период важности овог линка постављањем датума истека.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian language typically uses the formal 'Ви' (Vi) when addressing the user. The translation uses the informal 'ти' (ti) implied by the verb form 'Ограничи'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ограничите период важности овог линка постављањем датума истека.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'rok upotrebe' (use-by date) doesn't quite capture the nuance of 'expiration date' in this context. It implies a product's lifespan, not a date after which a link becomes invalid. A more accurate translation would convey the idea of a link becoming inactive or unavailable after a specific date.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ograniči period dostupnosti za ovaj link postavljanjem datuma isteka.
